short_description: Reliable; The hot wire handheld anemometer provides precise measurements of air velocity, temperature, and in-duct airflow, and can calculate volume flow when duct dimensions are provided
Practical; The hinged, telescopic shaft of the cfm meter extends up to 15", making it easy to measure airflow even in tight ducts, vents, or other hard-to-reach areas during HVAC inspections
Portable; This compact windflow meter is lightweight and easy to carry, saving time and effort and making it suitable for personal and professional servicing of air conditioning or HVAC systems
Wireless; Equipped with Bluetooth 4.0, the air flow meter connects effortlessly to smartphones or tablets, allowing users to take accurate remote readings without being tied to the device

Smart; The Smart Probe App for testo gauges hvac provides convenient instrument readings as tables and graphs. All measured data collected with the anemometer can be stored, retrieved, or included in custom reports
product_description: testo 405i Digital Anemometer handheld for measuring airflow, air velocity, and temperature on air conditioning systems Measure air velocity, temperature, and volume flow with just one instrument - the durable testo 405i temperature probe provides reliable measurements and, if combined with the smart probe app, allows remote measurement readings. With its automatic calculations, the app erases the need for error-prone manual calculations. Merely download the testo smart probe app, take advantage of user-friendly readings and create custom reports that are quickly saved and retrieved. The telescopic shaft is extendable and rotatable, making otherwise hardly accessible in-duct measurements of airflow fast and easy. The rugged housing protects the device from impact, making it extremely durable. name: Hot Wire Anemometer AM-286 – Industrial Airflow Meter with Telescopic Probe, CFM/CMM Air Volume Calculation, ±3% Accuracy, HVAC Ventilation & Duct Air Velocity Tester
short_description: DESIGNED FOR HVAC AIRFLOW DIAGNOSTICS – Professional hot wire anemometer built for HVAC technicians who need fast, accurate airflow measurements inside ducts, vents, diffusers, exhaust systems, and air handling units during installation, balancing, and maintenance.

TRUSTED TOOL FOR FIELD WORK & REPORTING – Combines precise air velocity measurement, automatic airflow calculation, and PC data export to help HVAC professionals diagnose airflow issues, verify system performance, and generate reliable measurement results.
WIDE WIND SPEED MEASUREMENT RANGE – Measures air velocity from 0.0 to 30 m/s (0.0–108 km/h, 0.0–67 mph) with 0.01 m/s resolution, suitable for low-speed ventilation and high-speed industrial airflow.
ACCURATE AND STABLE MEASUREMENTS – Provides ±3% accuracy for air velocity and ±1°C (±1.8°F) temperature accuracy, ensuring consistent and repeatable results during professional inspections.
AUTOMATIC AIRFLOW CALCULATION (CFM / CMM) – Converts measured air velocity into CFM (ft³/min) or CMM (m³/min) after manual input of duct or vent cross-sectional area, eliminating manual calculations.
HIGH-SENSITIVITY HOT WIRE SENSOR – Precision hot wire probe delivers rapid response and high sensitivity, especially effective for low air velocity and laminar airflow measurement in HVAC ducts.
BENDABLE TELESCOPIC PROBE FOR DEEP DUCTS – Flexible stainless-steel probe extends up to ~2 m, allowing accurate airflow measurement in hard-to-reach ceiling vents, narrow ducts, and exhaust outlets.
MULTIPLE UNITS FOR GLOBAL STANDARDS – Supports m/s, km/h, ft/min, knots, mph, as well as CFM and CMM, making the anemometer compatible with international HVAC and industrial standards.
MAX / MIN / AVG & DATA HOLD FUNCTIONS – Tracks airflow fluctuations with maximum, minimum, average, and HOLD modes for system diagnostics, airflow balancing, and documentation.
USB PC CONNECTION & RECHARGEABLE BATTERY – Enables USB data transfer to PC for long-term monitoring and analysis; powered by a built-in rechargeable lithium battery for extended field use.
